summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 31st Avenue West, from West Howe Street to West Crockett Street; by grading and otherwise improving the same; property owners' petition, being City Comptroller's File No. 198814 to all in accordance with the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
